Title: A Glance Through The Cloister Of Magdalen College
Narrative: word cloister place religious seclusion, trace root old french cloistre, latin claustrum lock, enclosed place claudere, close origin medieval cloister , walter horn describes cloister large square yard surrounded galleried porches, typically attached church enclosed double storied building form continuous solid architectural barrier separating world monk serf workman
